predicate.note: Frames file for 'jostle' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

roleset.name: fight mildly

example.name: the one example
example.text: On Wall Street men and women walk with great purpose, noticing one another only when they jostle for cabs.

roleset.note: Unlike 'fight' (etc), this seems to only take a plural subject including both the fighter and the co-fighter(s), which are separate args for the 'fight' class.
